body:
Okay, so in this one, somebody names 2 people in the music industry that they think would be a close match for the following person:
The following person then has to compare the two and say who they think is better, then create their own pair, and so on!

E.G:
OPTOBAT - Nicki Minaj & Iggy Azalea 
OPTOBAT #2 - Iggy! Eminem & Macklemore
OPTOBAT #3 - Eminem! Beyonce & Rihanna
And so on...

if you don't understand just reply and ill further explain, but for now, ill start!
Also last thing, the music star has to be currently active/still making music :)

Eminem & Lil' Wayne

(There - an easy no brainer to start)

title: {GAME} Music Stars Comparison

replies.body:
In my opinion, Eminem.
Beyoncé or Rihanna?
